document.full_text: one of three finalists in the white house's 2011 race to the top high school commencement challenge had hoped for a graduation speech delivered by the president himself.
document.title: bridgeport journal: small, poor, successful school waits for obama, in vain
lines_and_colors: one of three finalists in the white house's 2011 race to the top high school commencement challenge had hoped for a graduation speech delivered by the president himself.
